name: Sword of Fire
description: A fearsome sword imbued with the power of fire.
looks: The sword has a gleaming red blade with fiery runes engraved on it. The hilt is wrapped in black leather, and it emits a faint heat.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Allows the user to cast fire spells more effectively.

special_effects.fire_damage_over_time: The sword applies a burning effect to enemies, dealing additional fire damage over time.

name: Sword of Fire
description: A powerful sword imbued with the element of fire.
looks: The sword has a fiery red blade with intricate carvings along the handle. It emits a glowing heat.

special_weapon_skills.Flame Strike: Allows the wielder to unleash a powerful fiery attack.

special_effects.Fire Aura: Emits a burning aura that damages nearby enemies.

name: Sword of Fire
description: A flaming sword capable of dealing fire damage
looks: This sword has a blade that is constantly enveloped in flames, giving off a warm glow. The hilt is made of a black, heat-resistant material with intricate engravings.

special_weapon_skils.Fire Mastery: Increases fire damage dealt by the wielder by 25%

special_effects.Flame Burst: Has a chance to release a burst of flames upon striking an enemy, dealing additional fire damage

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made of pure silver.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate engravings. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with a silver pommel.

special_weapon_skils.Sword Mastery: Increases damage dealt with swords by 10%

name: Sword of Fire
description: A fiery sword that burns enemies upon impact.
looks: The sword has a long, silver blade with intricate engravings. The hilt is wrapped in red leather, and flames can be seen flickering along the edge of the blade.

special_effects.Burn: Has a chance to inflict burn damage on enemies.

name: Ruby Ring
description: A beautifully crafted ring made of pure ruby.
looks: The ring has a simple design with a single large ruby set in the middle.

name: Searing Blade
description: A fiery blade forged in the heart of a volcano.
looks: The Searing Blade is a longsword with a blackened hilt and a blade that glows with a red-hot fire.

special_weapon_skills.Fiery Strikes: Each successful hit has a chance to burn the target, dealing additional fire damage over time.

name: Sword of Fire
description: A powerful sword imbued with the element of fire.
looks: The sword has a long, curved blade with intricate designs etched into it. The blade emits a faint red glow, and the hilt is made of blackened steel. Flames dance along the edge of the blade.

special_effects.Burning Strikes: Chance to ignite enemies on hit, dealing additional fire damage over time.

name: Sword of Thunder
description: A powerful sword crackling with electric energy.
looks: The Sword of Thunder has a long, silver blade with intricate lightning bolt engravings. The hilt is wrapped in blue leather and has a small gemstone embedded in the pommel.

special_weapon_skills.Lightning Strike: Allows the wielder to unleash a powerful lightning strike that has a chance to stun the target.

special_effects.Static Charge: When attacking, has a chance to apply a static charge to the target, dealing additional lightning damage over time.

name: Sword of Fury
description: A powerful sword imbued with the essence of fury.
looks: The Sword of Fury is a large and menacing blade with a fiery red aura surrounding it. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with golden accents.

special_weapon_skils.Sword Mastery: Increases damage and accuracy when wielding a sword.

special_effects.Fury Strike: Chance to deal additional fire damage with each attack.

name: Enchanted Dagger
description: A small, silver dagger that glows with a faint magical aura.
looks: The dagger has a slender blade and a hilt wrapped in black leather. The blade is engraved with ancient runes.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy steel sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The steel sword has a long, straight blade with a hilt wrapped in leather.

name: Rusty Sword
description: A worn-out sword with a rusty blade.
looks: The blade of this sword is rusty and shows signs of wear. The hilt is wrapped in tattered leather.

special_effects.bleed: Has a chance to cause the target to bleed.

name: Sword of Fire
description: A powerful sword that radiates a fiery aura.
looks: The hilt is made of blackened steel with intricate engravings of flames. The blade itself is made of a shimmering red metal that seems to be on fire.

special_effects.fire_damage: Deals additional fire damage with each hit.

name: Mystic Wand
description: A powerful wand infused with magical energy.
looks: The wand is made of polished wood and is adorned with intricate carvings. It emits a faint glow.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old and worn-out sword with a rusty blade.
looks: The sword has a tarnished hilt with a worn leather grip. The blade is covered in rust spots and looks dull.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of iron.
looks: The blade is slightly tarnished but still sharp, with a leather-wrapped handle.

name: Mystic Staff
description: A powerful staff imbued with magical energies
looks: The staff is made of pure crystal with runes engraved along its length

special_effects.Spell Power: Increases the power of all spells by 10%

name: Sword of the Moon
description: A gleaming silver sword with a crescent moon-shaped hilt
looks: The Sword of the Moon is a beautifully crafted weapon, with a blade that shines like moonlight. The hilt is adorned with intricate designs depicting phases of the moon.

special_weapon_skills.Swordsmanship: Increases the wielder's proficiency with swords

special_effects.Lunar Fury: Has a chance to deal bonus damage during the night

name: Golden Sword
description: A shining golden sword with intricate engravings
looks: The golden sword has a long, curved blade with a golden hilt adorned with precious gemstones.

special_effects.Golden Aura: Emits a golden aura that boosts nearby allies' morale
